title: Name Change?
body: I liked my name, but now while I was thinking, I think my name is immature or out of the gecko. I wanna change it, but it cost so damn much, and I don't want to change it that way. *YOU CAN BUY MANY CHAMPS* Paying real money? No. Like... If I play this game A LOT I'll pay. But for now, Lets keep it as it is. How do you feel? And stay Triggered :>

replies.body: You don't have to use RP to purchase a name change.  There is an equivalent IP value you can gain just through playing the game.  We don't provide free name changes, but I hope that helps!
